Name: Plasticalypse - Submarine Adventures
About the game: STORY Experience a journey through a sunken world, as the last surviving cleaner of the seas sets out to complete a gargantuan task of restoring life on planet earth. EXPERIENCE 'Plasticalypse: TrashSub Adventures“ is an atmospheric 3D action-adventure following a journey of the last ocean cleaner submarine that is tasked to restore the ecosystem of a dying earth. Explore the sunken remains of old civilizations, unravel mysteries hiding hubs of survivors. Establish embassies, collect resources and upgrade your submarine to fight off enemies and expand your fleet. All this and more awaits you in 'Plasticalypse: TrashSub Adventures“. DISCOVERY Discover the underwater cities of Paris, Athens and Vilnius. Help them in their fight for survival, visit ruined monuments and solve hidden mysteries. Encounter mutated creatures affected by pollution and figure out the means to restore the marine life of the ocean. Experience the world where humans are no longer the dominant species of the planet.
